tweets.text:
*** FLOOD ALERT ***

The Environment Agency @EnvAgencyNW have issued a ‚ÄòFlooding is possible - be prepared‚Äô alert for areas iof Tameside. 

More details here:
https://t.co/txKTHfBfAx

urls.title: Flood information for River Mersey Uplands catchment including Hyde, Ashton-under-Lyne, Denton, Stalybridge and Glossop - GOV.UK
urls.description: Check your risk of flooding: get current flood warnings, river and sea levels, check the 5-day forecast or use flood risk maps

tweets.text: We‚Äôve now issued the 1st of @EnvAgencyNW #flood alerts. Won‚Äôt be last & we will be issuing warnings In the days ahead. Full details at https://t.co/vKsRlvVySm #PrepareActSurvive #floodaware https://t.co/FPrIB2wi5p

Heavy rain brings a high risk of surface water #flooding. 

Stay safe and don‚Äôt walk or drive through flood water. 

For guidance on #SurfaceWaterFlooding in your area, contact your local authority. 

#PrepareActSurvive https://t.co/8eYE9vH9AD

Flood alerts are in place for parts of South Yorks. As a precaution Rotherham Council is taking steps to protect high-risk residential areas.

Make sure you are prepared in the event of flooding and follow @EnvAgency & @EnvAgencyYNE for updates

‚û°Ô∏è https://t.co/EUSqZinZO1 https://t.co/3ZlF0nZets

urls.title: Flood advice and information ‚Äì Rotherham Metropolitan Borough Council
urls.description: When there's flooding in Rotherham, we'll provide assistance, practical support and information as soon as it's safe and appropriate to do so.

tweets.text: Storm Christoph is on its way which means we‚Äôll be activating the #Didsbury part of the Mersey Flood Basin tomorrow morning - joint @ManCityCouncil @EnvAgency for Councillors below: https://t.co/5BmTSyjdxJ

There are a number of flood warnings in place across England, with heavy rainfall expected in the next few days.

By knowing what to do in a #flood, you can reduce the impacts to your home, family and possessions.

Check your flood risk: https://t.co/MPz7FwsWeY 

#StormCristoph https://t.co/FMPUiziILV
This keeps happening - remember our photo from October? https://t.co/38KsbsjIGY https://t.co/oCGraOTsUT

Flood alert from the @EnvAgencyYNE for Upper River Don and River Dearne catchment due to the heavy rain forecast.

Flooding is possible tomorrow. 

To see the latest flood warnings for Barnsley, please visit the Environment Agency website at https://t.co/iq8Rf0GAKv https://t.co/8ybsRDTLUN

Is looking like a really tough few days ahead with a stark #forecast of ‚ÄúSignificant inland #flooding impacts are probable from Tues to Thurs for parts of N, C & E England.‚Äù @EnvAgencyNW prep continues across #Lancashire #Cumbria & beyond. #Floodaware https://t.co/IrsyPsUPgC

If you think you maybe at #Flood risk with the potential bad weather  Are you signed up for @EnvAgency #flood warnings?  Plan NOW what you are going to do -where you'll put your car & belongings to a place of safety. Check you remember how to install any #PFR products & stay safe

@DobbyWoods @CRTContactUs Are we in the middle of responding to you, or are you saying you e-mailed us and you've heard nothing back? 

I don't know who you e-mailed, but you could call us, and it would be passed to the local team: 0800 807060. Thanks, Peter
